replies.bodyText:
True. But right now, it is kinda specific, because it's only used by Json. only json is looking for Collection/Map/single values. Avro has its own utils which looks for Collection/Map/GenericData.Record/single value.
All others use RecordReaderUtils, which look for only Collection/single-value
Followup items:

Add this nested extraction support to all formats
In the process, unify the code in JsonRecordExtractorUtils, AvroUtils, RecordReaderUtils.
